actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Currency and Foreign Transactions Reporting Act to allow for the payment of compensation to informers.

summary.text: Amends the Currency and Foreign Transactions Reporting Act to authorize the Secretary of the Treasury to pay informants who report violations of the reporting requirements applicable to exports and imports of monetary instruments.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Currency and Foreign Transactions Reporting Act to allow for the payment of compensation to informers.
